pullrequest.title: Implemented orbit around an arbitrary point

content.raw:
Nice, works much better now, thanks! Fixes issues #116, #241, and #267.

One improvement might be to use models' visual mesh for ray-tracing the focal point instead of the bounding box (seems like that's what's currently being used). Currently this behaviour prevents you from clicking a point on the model or to click on a point behind the model (e.g. the ground on the other side of the polaris ranger).
